body:
@lee218llnl @adamjstewart  
This PR supercedes #8181.  The submission was redone in order to clean-up extra merge commits.
```Summary:
Add access to the master tree for a dyninst@develop version  Also, fix issues related to trying to build dyninst due to dyninst's transition away from libelf and libdwarf as they move to elfutils and elfutils dwarf. From comments I added to the dyninst package.py file:
```
```
+    # Dyninst depends on libelf and libdwarf prior to 9.3.0
+    # Dyninst depends on elfutils and libdwarf from 9.3.0 to but
+    # not including 10.0.alpha
+    # Dyninst depends on elfutils and elfutils libdw from 10.0.alpha onwards
+    # elf@0 is an abstaction for libelf
+    # elf@1 is an abstaction for elfutils
```
title: Add the ability to build the dyninst master branch under the develop version name.
